title: All that mighty heart
creator_credit: Edgar H. Anstey, British Transport Federation and R.K. Neilson Baxter
brief_description: A portrait of daily life in London. Transport plays a vital part in the scene as rush hour and lull alternate, and as work is replaced by leisure, or the evening gaiety of the West End entertainment. Under the streets another tube line is being tunnelled to carry the increasing number of workers.
